message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm confident it can greatly benefit you. To start the conversation, I'm offering it at $1,400,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in the product's value. I am willing to pay $1,300,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, the value I place on this product is considerably higher. To meet you somewhere in the middle, I'm willing to let it go for $1,375,000.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect your valuation of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1,325,000. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your efforts to find common ground.  I'm willing to come down slightly further to $1,350,000.  I believe this is a very fair offer, considering the significant value this product will bring to your business.

Alice, thank you for your continued flexibility. I am willing to consider $1,330,000 for the product. This price reflects my assessment of its value while also allowing us to reach an agreement within your comfort zone.
